bugReport.title: Bug report or feedback
bugReport.description: We will try to help you as fast as we can. Please, try to describe your problem in as much detail as possible. We also would love to hear your ideas and suggestions for new features or improvements. ❤️
bugReport.placeholder: Describe the problem or your suggestion
bugReport.error: Something went wrong. Please, try again or write us via email support@writex.io
bugReport.success: Thank you for your feedback! We will try to help you as fast as we can.

integrations.name: Integrations
integrations.description: Integrate your account with other services.

medium.connected: {{mediumName}} – your Medium account integrated with current profile. You can export publications to your Medium account.
medium.notConnected: You don't have an integration with Medium.

modal.description: To connect your Medium account, you need to get an integration token.
modal.description2: You can get it by following the instructions below.
modal.step1: Go to Medium settings –> "Security and Apps" –> "Integration tokens".
modal.step2: Copy the integration token and paste it to the field below.
modal.saved: Integration with Medium was successfully established.
modal.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please, check if you copied full Medium Access token. If yes, please try again or report a bug.
